title: Healing and Stuff!
author: verias
text:
So, William has really taken a backseat for a bit, and I thought it might be fun to see what he gets up to when he's not out with the girls, or drinking at the bar.

Also, my wrist is healing up, slowly, so I feel pretty good about being able to hop back in the saddle to do things for you guys.

See you on Thursday!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: ugh messed up wrists are no fun, You take care of those half dozen bones.
